title: "This year we find out who is better: Dogs vs. Cats."
body:
Riot: *gives the prestige edition skin to a dog*

Ok.

replies.body: That means cats are better because fuck prestige skins
underrated comment
This

Personal opinion: 

cats are shit animals. 
You feed them, give them shelter and give them love... They scratch and bite you when ever they fucking feel like it

My dog is 17 years old tho 
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

> [{quoted}](name=JuiceBoxP,realm=EUNE,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=yIltAkuU,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2019-03-05T21:00:53.611+0000)
>
> Personal opinion: 
> 
> cats are shit animals. 
> You feed them, give them shelter and give them love... They scratch and bite you when ever they fucking feel like it
> 
> My dog is 17 years old tho 
> {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

Spoken like a person who's never lived with or given love to a cat. Cat can be incredibly affectionate too, but they're generally more cautious than dogs.

Was just about to say this. 

 As much as I love dogs, not all cats are violent scratchers. My mom had some nice cats back in the day who loved getting their bellies or butts rubbed :p

> [{quoted}](name=JuiceBoxP,realm=EUNE,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=yIltAkuU,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2019-03-05T21:00:53.611+0000)
>
> Personal opinion: 
> 
> cats are shit animals. 
> You feed them, give them shelter and give them love... They scratch and bite you when ever they fucking feel like it
> 
> My dog is 17 years old tho 
> {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

Personal opinion:

People who think cats are shit animals are shit humans
Guess i am a shit human then XD

My cat doesn’t scratch me at all and is super cuddly when she wants to be. Just give them space when they want space, don’t pick them up when they don’t want to be held, be gentle and pat without ruffling the fur. Treat them with respect and they are the sweetest animals ever, no de clawing needed (but you must spay or neuter them, they cause a lot of hormones which will make them grumpy and no one wants stray kittens being born).

Also let them climb up to high places within reason, like the top of a wardrobe. Helps them not feel trapped.

I love all animals, but you've got it wrong about cats. Cats aren't as in your face with their affection as dogs are, but that doesn't mean they aren't affectionate. Sometimes cats just leave you alone and sometimes they want to spend time with you, just like a human would. I kinda love them for that, they are pretty low maintenance. 

I love dogs too. But I have had many cats and been close to family members' cats, and all of them have unique personalities are really loving, just like a dog would be. If a cat is scratching and biting unprovoked, then there is something wrong or they are flat out a wild cat. Which isn't the case if you are sheltering them and giving them love.

I've had to live with dogs and cats before, and dogs are much more of a pain in the ass. They slobber all over you, they make huge messes, they hump anything roughly their size (including your leg) and are loud AF when you're trying to sleep.

what if I told you, you can like both dogs and cats.

however if you like neither then you're just a complete monster
I hate real dogs, but dogs in video games are pretty cool. I love all cats.
what's wrong with sweet dogs? {{sticker:sg-janna}}

I don't like dogs because its rare to find a sweet dog :P and they are also mroe dangerous then cats. Usually cats attack you only when u make them do (if they are scared, want some privacy,you're bad to them)

I would respond by saying that dogs act in the same way, but there tends to be a higher chance that dogs will be raised poorly since they do require more direct care than cats. Dogs are also more socialized with strangers (read: need to be walked daily), which creates more situations in which they might act out. I would also suggest that the only reason they are "more dangerous" than cats is purely due to size. a small dog is no more dangerous than a cat. 

Of course this is all personal opinion, I just really dislike the whole "which one is better" debate. They're both great imo and all the doggos and kitties deserve love.
I've never met a "sweet dog"

I feel bad for you then. Dogs really are great, cats as well. Dogs are more wearing their emotions on their sleeve, cats are more reserved. both are good, I'm just sad for you that you haven't known the wonderful companionship of a dog. I hope you will experience it someday!
Cat owner here, this just gave us more morale

Wait, who's getting the prestige skin? I couldn't find it on YouTube or through a Google search.

 ######also dogs > cats don't @ me
It's the dog Fizz skin.
Oh damn lol, thanks. For some reason I couldn't find it anywhere even when I searched "Prestige dog skin League of Legends"

Rito is with dogs lol :P dogs get a prestige skin, cats does not . Dogs get cool looking chromas cats does not. I woudl also said that Meowrick's Ultimate looks weird they could just make a giant cat not looking that weird :/
It's a Fizz skin though.

They had to. Fizz and Corki are representing the Dogs while Rengar and Yorick are representing Cats. they had to give them SOMETHING, even though it's just an overpriced chroma to compensate for how much less popular the skins will be just by who got them alone.
Dogs, obviously. At least none of them got a full rework...
{{champion:19}}
Cetri's got you there

> [{quoted}](name=Cetri,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=yIltAkuU,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2019-03-06T01:00:24.345+0000)
>
> {{champion:19}}

I... meant champs from the skin line, but sure.

Dogs...cause Corgis have such a strong presence in this event.

Now if Cats had Siamese breed on their side, then I would be more conflicted.
This is supposed to be a joke right. I legitimately can't tell if you are joking or not.
What do you mean
Nvm, they actually made a prestige skin out of it. lol
